review: Despite me being a patient with low pain tolerance, the doctor helped me ease up psychologically first, and went ahead with the treatment. The treatment took 4-5 sessions but the doctor ensured I was always at ease and calm. The RCT job my itself was proficient. I’m rid of a long term tooth pain thanks to Dr. Karthik.
Even though this place was around 20kms far from my home went there for a second option for my 2year old daughter’s swollen face condition. He gave us a genuine opinion.
